clinical_study.brief_title: Boston Scientific Registry of Deep Brain Stimulation for Treatment of Essential Tremor (ET)
clinical_study.official_title: Boston Scientific Registry of Deep Brain Stimulations for Treatment of Essential Tremor (ET):ET Registry

brief_summary.textblock: To compile characteristics of real-world outcomes for Boston Scientific Corporation's commercially approved Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) Systems, when used according to the applicable Directions for Use, for the treatment of Essential Tremor.

detailed_description.textblock: To compile characteristics of real-world outcomes using Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) for the treatment of Essential Tremor to add to the evidence available for treatment of ET.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Quality of Life during the study as compared with baseline using the Quality of Life in Essential Tremor Questionnaire (QUEST)
primary_outcome.description: Change in quality of life over the course of the study using QUEST

other_outcome.measure: Change in tremor scores during the study as compared with baseline as assessed by Fahn-Tolosa- Marin Rating Scale
other_outcome.description: Improvement in tremor scores as assessed by Fahn-Tolosa-Marin Tremor Rating Scale (FTMTRS) during the study as compared with baseline

other_outcome.measure: Impression of Change scores during the study using Global Impression of Change
other_outcome.description: Impression of Change scores during the study using Global Impression of Change

arm_group.description: Subjects with Essential Tremor being implanted with Boston Scientific Deep Brain Stimulation Systems

intervention.description: Subjects receiving DBS implant for treatment of Essential Tremor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Meets criteria established in the locally applicable Directions for Use (DFU) for Essential Tremor
- Is at least 18 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Meets any contraindication in locally applicable Directions for Use
